definition: to knock down and kill sb with a car/to run over sb/to run sb down
to knock against/to bump into/to run into/to meet by accident

sentences.english: I hope you ride my bike without a helmet and get hit by a monster truck.
sentences.chinese: 我希望你骑我的自行车时没戴头盔被一辆泥头车撞死。

sentences.english: He was angry with the person who drove the car that hit his brother.
sentences.chinese: 他对那个开车撞死他哥哥的人很气愤。

sentences.english: I was convinced that I’d killed an innocent animal.
sentences.chinese: 我以为自己撞死了一头无辜的动物。

sentences.english: He didn't mean to, but he did it, and he is responsible.
sentences.chinese: 他不想撞死人，但是无论如何人死了，他的责任。

sentences.english: Dirty night, the autocycle that fiance is galloped by Zhimin bumps dead.
sentences.chinese: 雨夜，未婚夫被智敏飞驰的摩托车撞死。

sentences.english: What are those people who you killed?
RECKLESS】Two children were killed by a reckless driver.
sentences.chinese: 两个孩子被鲁莽的司机撞死。

sentences.english: His car hit his brother was very angry.
sentences.chinese: 他对那个开车撞死他哥哥的人很气愤。

sentences.english: In Japan, a lot of tanuki get killed by cars when passing roads.
sentences.chinese: 在日本，许多狸猫在横穿马路时被汽车撞死。

sentences.english: It wouldn't be right to kill five people if you could only kill one person instead.
sentences.chinese: 如果能只撞死一个人，那么撞死五个人肯定是不对的。

sentences.english: It wouldn't be right to kill five people if you could only kill one person instead.
sentences.chinese: 如果能只撞死一个人，那么撞死五个人肯定是不对的。

sentences.english: The car won the race, but its driver came close to being killed.
sentences.chinese: 那辆车赢了比赛，但驾驶员查点被撞死。

sentences.english: He is driving a car in which no one can die.
sentences.chinese: 他开着一辆乘车人不会被撞死的车。

sentences.english: I had killed someone and I was afraid.
Flustered damaged Eddie petulance attempts by motorcycle will both die.
sentences.chinese: 气急损坏的埃迪一怒之下希图用摩托车将两人撞死。

sentences.english: Julius was hit by a truck and killed in 1938.
sentences.chinese: 朱利叶斯1938年被卡车撞死。

definition: to knock against/to bump into/to run into/to meet by accident
to knock down/to knock over/to run over (sb)
to hack to death/to kill with an ax
to crash (into another car)/(fig.) (of opinions, schedules etc) to clash/(of subject matter) to be the same
cut off the flesh as punishment
